import*as types from"./../Constant/ActionTypes";import callApi from"./../utils/apiCaller";export var acShowSlide=function acShowSlide(){return{type:types.BANNER_SLIDES};};export var navItem=function navItem(){return{type:types.NAVITEM};};export var exploreSlides=function exploreSlides(){return{type:types.EXPLORE_SLIDES};};export var gearSlides=function gearSlides(){return{type:types.GEAR_SLIDES};};export var onChangeLogin=function onChangeLogin(){return{type:types.CHANGE_LOGIN_SIGNIN};};export var acOnRegister=function acOnRegister(user){return{type:types.REGISTER,user:user};};export var acRegisterRequest=function acRegisterRequest(user){return function(dispatch){return callApi("users","POST",user).then(function(res){return dispatch(acOnRegister(res.data));});};};export var acOnLogged=function acOnLogged(username){return{type:types.LOGGED,username:username};};export var acGetUsersRequest=function acGetUsersRequest(){return function(dispatch){return callApi("users","GET",null).then(function(res){if(res.data){return dispatch(acGetUsers(res.data));}});};};export var acGetUsers=function acGetUsers(users){return{type:types.GET_USERS,users:users};};// List Products
export var acFetchProductsRequest=function acFetchProductsRequest(){return function(dispatch){return callApi("products","GET",null).then(function(res){if(res.data){return dispatch(acFetchProducts(res.data));}});};};export var acFetchProducts=function acFetchProducts(products){return{type:types.PRODUCTS,products:products};};export var acUpProductRequest=function acUpProductRequest(product){return function(dispatch){return callApi("products","POST",product).then(function(res){return dispatch(acUpProducts(res.data));});};};export var acUpProducts=function acUpProducts(product){return{type:types.UPPRODUCT,product:product};};export var acDeleteProductRequest=function acDeleteProductRequest(id){return function(dispatch){return callApi("products/".concat(id),"DELETE",null).then(function(res){return dispatch(acDeleteProduct(id));});};};export var acDeleteProduct=function acDeleteProduct(id){return{type:types.DELETE_PRODUCT,id:id};};export var acUpdateProductRequest=function acUpdateProductRequest(product){return function(dispatch){return callApi("products/".concat(product.id),"PUT",product).then(function(res){return dispatch(acUpdateProduct(product));});};};export var acUpdateProduct=function acUpdateProduct(product){return{type:types.UPDATE_PRODUCT,product:product};};// Cart
export var acGetAllProductCartRequest=function acGetAllProductCartRequest(){return function(dispatch){return callApi("carts","GET",null).then(function(res){return dispatch(acGetAllProductCart(res.data));});};};export var acGetAllProductCart=function acGetAllProductCart(products){return{type:types.GET_ALL_CART,products:products};};export var acAddToCartRequest=function acAddToCartRequest(product){return function(dispatch){return callApi("carts","POST",product).then(function(res){return dispatch(acAddToCart(res.data));});};};export var acAddToCart=function acAddToCart(product){return{type:types.ADD_TO_CART,product:product};};export var acDeleteProductCartRequest=function acDeleteProductCartRequest(id){return function(dispatch){return callApi("carts/".concat(id),"DELETE",null).then(function(res){return dispatch(acDeleteProductCart(id));});};};export var acDeleteProductCart=function acDeleteProductCart(id){return{type:types.DELETE_CART,id:id};};// Login - Register (Admin)
export var acRegisterAdminRequest=function acRegisterAdminRequest(user){return function(dispatch){return callApi("usersAdmin","POST",user).then(function(res){return dispatch(acRegisterAdmin(res.data));});};};export var acRegisterAdmin=function acRegisterAdmin(user){return{type:types.REGISTER,user:user};};export var acGetUserAdminRequest=function acGetUserAdminRequest(){return function(dispatch){return callApi("usersAdmin","GET",null).then(function(res){return dispatch(acGetUserAdmin(res.data));});};};export var acGetUserAdmin=function acGetUserAdmin(users){return{type:types.GET_USERS_ADMIN,users:users};};export var acUpdateUserAdminRequest=function acUpdateUserAdminRequest(user){return function(dispatch){return callApi("usersAdmin/".concat(user.id),"PUT",user).then(function(res){return dispatch(acUpdateUserAdmin(res.data));});};};export var acUpdateUserAdmin=function acUpdateUserAdmin(user){return{type:types.UPDATE_USER_ADMIN,user:user};};export var acUpdateUserRequest=function acUpdateUserRequest(user){return function(dispatch){return callApi("users/".concat(user.id),"PUT",user).then(function(res){return dispatch(acUpdateUser(res.data));});};};export var acUpdateUser=function acUpdateUser(user){return{type:types.UPDATE_USER,user:user};};export var DeleteUserAdminRequest=function DeleteUserAdminRequest(id){return function(dispatch){return callApi("usersAdmin/".concat(id),"Delete",null).then(function(res){return dispatch(DeleteUserAdmin(id));});};};export var DeleteUserAdmin=function DeleteUserAdmin(id){return{type:types.DELETE_USER_ADMIN,id:id};};// Delete Customer
export var DeleteUserRequest=function DeleteUserRequest(id){return function(dispatch){return callApi("users/".concat(id),"Delete",null).then(function(res){return dispatch(DeleteUser(id));});};};export var DeleteUser=function DeleteUser(id){return{type:types.DELETE_USER,id:id};};// WORK
export var getWorkRequest=function getWorkRequest(){return function(dispatch){return callApi("works","GET",null).then(function(res){dispatch(getWork(res.data));});};};export var getWork=function getWork(works){return{type:types.GET_WORK,works:works};};export var addWorkRequest=function addWorkRequest(work){return function(dispatch){return callApi("works","POST",work).then(function(res){dispatch(addWork(res.data));});};};export var addWork=function addWork(work){return{type:types.ADD_WORK,work:work};};export var deleteWorkRequest=function deleteWorkRequest(id){return function(dispatch){return callApi("works/".concat(id),"DELETE",null).then(function(res){dispatch(deleteWork(id));});};};export var deleteWork=function deleteWork(id){return{type:types.DELETE_WORK,id:id};};export var updateWorkRequest=function updateWorkRequest(work){return function(dispatch){return callApi("works/".concat(work.id),"PUT",work).then(function(res){dispatch(updateWork(work));});};};export var updateWork=function updateWork(work){return{type:types.UPDATE_WORK,work:work};};
